Description: !Exclamachine Type Foundry is a growing collection of highly distinct typefaces, including display, experimental and titling fonts. We also create custom fonts and logotypes.

High quality multilingual fonts at a low price - for professional (non-english) designers with a small budget! Offers a wide selection of mainly display-fonts with a large character set supporting 65 languages requiring more that the basic A-Z. Unicode OpenType Pro and TrueType formats for Mac and Windows. Instant downloads.
